methodology.title: How Our Slide Generation Works
methodology.subtitle: Our advanced AI-powered methodology transforms your ideas into compelling presentations through a 5-step process

understanding.title: Understanding Request
understanding.description: The system analyzes your request to extract key parameters like audience, goals, and constraints.
understanding.content: The AI extracts parameters from your prompt: user persona, slide goal, slide constraints, and task type (create, edit, or chat).

planning.title: Planning Structure
planning.description: Based on extracted parameters, the system creates a detailed slide-by-slide plan.
planning.content: The planner creates a JSON structure with each slide's type, title, key message, and content points, forming the overall narrative flow.

extracting.title: Extracting Information
extracting.description: For each slide, relevant information is extracted from your input to support the key message.
extracting.content: Each slide gets carefully extracted key facts, compelling expressions, and storytelling elements designed to convey your message effectively.

generating.title: Generating Slides
generating.description: Individual slides are generated with optimal content and formatting based on the plan.
generating.content: Each slide is crafted to have a clear focus, compelling visuals through language, and follows best practices in presentation design.

refining.title: Refining Presentation
refining.description: The entire presentation is refined to ensure narrative flow, consistency, and polish.
refining.content: The final refinement process ensures transitions between slides are smooth, formatting is consistent, and the overall story builds properly.
